sql: SELECT MIN(chn.name) AS character, MIN(t.title) AS movie_with_american_producer FROM char_name AS chn, cast_info AS ci, company_name AS cn, company_type AS ct, movie_companies AS mc, role_type AS rt, title AS t WHERE ci.note  like '%(producer)%' AND cn.country_code  = '[us]' AND t.production_year > 1990 AND t.id = mc.movie_id AND t.id = ci.movie_id AND ci.movie_id = mc.movie_id AND chn.id = ci.person_role_id AND rt.id = ci.role_id AND cn.id = mc.company_id AND ct.id = mc.company_type_id;
hint_str:
/*+ HashJoin(cn ct t mc rt chn ci)
 HashJoin(ct t mc rt chn ci)
 HashJoin(rt chn ci)
 HashJoin(chn ci)
 HashJoin(ct t mc)
 HashJoin(t mc)
 BitmapScan(cn)
 SeqScan(ct)
 SeqScan(t)
 IndexScan(mc)
 BitmapScan(rt)
 SeqScan(chn)
 SeqScan(ci)
 Leading((cn ((ct (t mc)) (rt (chn ci))))) */
